title: What should I do in Define Task?
content:
Provide parameters for the two taxonomies you will align/compare. Fill the form on this page to define the task.

Task Name: Provide a name for your task/analysis. This name will be used in Task Manager to identify this task.

Select Taxonomy 1 and 2: Shown the folders you selected for this task in the Input step. Click Select Folder button to select a different folder if needed. For each taxonomy, enter its Author and Year of publication.

Selected Term Review Folder 1 and 2: Shown the 'Terms Reviewed' folder system auto-selected for this task, if any. You should not change this unless you know what you are doing.

Selected Ontology Folder: Shown the ontology folder system auto-selected for this task, if any. You should not change this unless you know what you are doing.

Select Taxon Group:Select a taxon group relevant to your input. System will use the resources (e.g., glossary) relevant/related to your taxon group in this task.
